election_process: Sɛnea Election Process no yɛ adwuma
best_practices_voter: Nsɛm a ɛho hia fa Abato ho
features_available: Nneɛma a ɛwɔ hɔ ma wo
for_help: Sɛ wopɛ mmoa wɔ election setup, nsɛm ano adwuma, anaa platform nsɛmmisa ho a, frɛ yɛn support team:
ec_description: Biribiara a ɛsɛ sɛ wunim sɛ Election Commissioner wɔ Neon Voting System so.
voter_description: Biribiara a ɛsɛ sɛ wunim fa abato ho wɔ Neon Voting System so.
neon_description: Neon Voting System yɛ system a ɛwɔ ahobammɔ, wotumi hwehwɛ mu, na ɛyɛ ma nnipa pii wɔ digital election platform.
ec_role_desc: Sɛ EC a, woyɛ nea wode wo ho hyɛ election ho nhyehyɛe, nhyehyɛe, ne ho hwɛ wɔ wo ahyehyɛde mu. Super Admin hwɛ w'adwuma ansa na abatow afi ase.
voter_role_desc: Sɛ ɔbatɔni a, wowɔ tumi sɛ wopaw akannifo ne ananmusifo denam internet so abatow a ɛwɔ ahobammɔ so. Wo vote yɛ w'ankasa de, ɛwɔ ahobammɔ, na wobetumi ato pɛnkoro pɛ.
ec_step1: Login - Fa wo Organization ID ne EC password di dwuma na wo afa wo dashboard so
ec_step2: Setup Election - Fa positions, candidates, ne voters ka wo election ho
ec_step3: Submit ma Approval - Sɛ woasiesie a, fa wo election kɔ Super Admin hɔ ma ɔnhwehwɛ
ec_step4: Yɛ Nsakrae (sɛ ɛho hia a) - Sɛ wɔsan wo election ba a, siesie haw ahorow na san fa kɔ
ec_step5: Hwɛ Abatow - Sɛ wɔpene so a, abatow bue ne ho ankasa na wotumi di nkitahodie akyi
ec_step6: Hwɛ Nea ɛbae - Sɛ abatow wie a, hwehwɛ nea ɛbae na pae mu ka nkonimdifo
voter_step1: Gye wo nkrataa (email, SMS, anaa WhatsApp) fi wo Election Commissioner hɔ
voter_step2: Login fa wo Organization ID ne wo ankasa vote PIN di dwuma
voter_step3: Hwehwɛ positions ne candidates nyinaa yiye
voter_step4: Paw candidates a wopɛ wɔn ma position biara
voter_step5: Hwehwɛ nea woapaw ansa na woafa akɔ
voter_step6: Fa wo vote akɔ - wobetumi ato pɛnkoro pɛ
voter_step7: Sɛ woto aba wie a, login bio na wo ahu election nea ɛbae (mpɛn 10 kosi soro)
ec_practice1: Hwehwɛ voter emails/telephone nɔma mpɛn abien ansa na woafa akɔ approval
ec_practice2: Hwɛ hu sɛ candidate din, positions, ne mfonini yɛ nokware
ec_practice3: Sɔ wo election nhyehyɛe hwɛ ansa na woafa akɔ
ec_practice4: Bua ntɛm sɛ Super Admin san wo election ba ma nsakrae
ec_practice5: Di voter nkitahodie akyi wɔ abatow bere no mu
ec_practice6: Fa elections a wowie sie ansa na woafi foforo ase
voter_practice1: Ma wo vote PIN nyɛ kokoamsɛm - mfa nkyɛ obi
voter_practice2: To aba pɛnkoro pɛ - wɔmma wo nto aba mpɛn pii
voter_practice3: Hwehwɛ candidates nyinaa ansa na woapaw
voter_practice4: Hwɛ hu sɛ woto aba ma positions nyinaa (sɛ ɛho hia a)
voter_practice5: Fa kɔ ansa na abatow bere no aba awiei
voter_practice6: Frɛ wo EC ntɛm sɛ wohyia haw bi
feature_voters: Voters Tab - Fa voters ka ho ankorankoro anaa wɔ bulk (CSV/Excel) mu
feature_positions: Positions Tab - Kyerɛkyerɛ election positions ne vote dodow a wɔma
feature_candidates: Candidates Tab - Fa candidates ka ho a mfonini ne nsɛm ka ho
feature_invites: Invites Tab - Fa voter nkrataa ma denam email, SMS, anaa WhatsApp so
feature_outcomes: Outcomes Tab - Hwɛ nea ɛbae wɔ bere ankasa mu na pae mu ka nkonimdifo
feature_settings: Settings Tab - Hyehyɛ organization nsɛm ne election ɔkwan
feature_approval: Approval Tab - Fa elections kɔ na di approval tebea akyi
security1: Wo vote wɔ cryptography mu na ɛyɛ anonymous
security2: Wɔnhu nea ɛbae kosi sɛ election no ba awiei
security3: Obiara ntumi nhu sɛnea woto aba, a Election Commissioners nso ka ho
security4: System no si vote a ɛboro pɛnkoro kwan
security5: Wɔkora votes nyinaa wɔ cloud mu a ɛwɔ ahobammɔ
add_voters_to_start: Ka abatofoɔ ho na fi ase
add_first_voter: Ka Wo Obatofoɔ A ɔdi Kan Ho
add_candidates: Ka Wɔn a Wɔrepere Dwa Ho
all_positions_must_have: Dibea nyinaa hwehiɛ sɛ ɛwɔ koraa
add_candidate: Ka Obi a Ɔrepere Dwa Ho
participation: Wɔn a Wɔde Wɔn Ho Hyɛɛ Mu
excluding_replaced: Enni wɔn a wɔasesa wɔn ho
results_by_position: Nea Efi Mu Baeɛ wɔ Dibea Biara Mu
export_results: Yi Nea Efi Mu Baeɛ Fi
monitor_sent_invitations: Hwɛ ntoatoasɔ a wɔde kɔeɛ, san fa kɔ, na di akyi
send_alerts_to_voters: Fa kɔkɔbɔ kɔ ma abatofoɔ fa abatow no ho
reset_or_clear: San hyehyɛ anaa pepa abatow data
define_start_end_times: Kyerɛkyerɛ mfitaseɛ ne awieɛ berɛ ma abatow
all_requirements_must_be_met: Ɛsɛ sɛ wɔdi nhyehyɛeɛ ahodoɔ nyinaa so ansa na wɔde akɔ
once_submitted_superadmin: Sɛ wɔde kɔ a, SuperAdmin bi bɛhwehwɛ wo abatow nhyehyɛeɛ no mu. Abatotufoɔ ntumi nnto aba kɔsi sɛ wɔagye atom.
complete_remaining_requirements: Wie nhyehyɛeɛ ahodoɔ {count} a aka no ansa na wode akɔ. Nhyehyɛeɛ no hwɛ ankasa sɛ wɔawie nhyehyɛeɛ ahodoɔ no.
election_ready_for_submission: Wo abatow no aso ma wɔde akɔ. Klik wɔ soro ha de kɔ ma SuperAdmin agyetoɔ.
election_under_review: SuperAdmin rehwehwɛ wo abatow no mu seesei. Wɔbɛbɔ wo amanneɛ sɛ wɔasi gyinaeɛ.
election_approved_voters_can_vote: Wɔagye wo abatow no atom! Abatotufoɔ tumi to aba wɔ berɛ a wɔahyehyɛ no mu.
search_admins: Hwehwɛ dwumadiefoɔ wɔ din, email anaa adwuma so...
add_first_admin: Fa wo dwumadiefoɔ a ɛdi kan ka ho ma wɔahwɛ nhyehyɛeɛ
password_requirement: Yɛ no nkyerɛwtohene 8, fa nkyerɛwde ne nɔma ka ho
password_min_8: Password no nhia sɛ ɛbɛyɛ nkyerɛwtohene 8
email_exists: Dwumadiefoɔ bi wɔ hɔ dedaw a ɔwɔ saa email yi
confirm_delete_admin: Wopɛ sɛ woyi dwumadiefoɔ yi fi hɔ
admin_deleted: Wɔayi dwumadiefoɔ no afi hɔ yie
error_deleting_admin: Wɔantumi anyi dwumadiefoɔ no afi hɔ
super_admin_desc: Yɛ ahyehyɛde, sɔ abato ano, hwɛ nhyehyɛe so.
live_overview: Abato ne abato ho nsɛm a ɛrekɔ so
